name: Bandolero - Serie C Clandestinos - Traviesos
additionalNotes: C for Clandestinos. The Bandolero cigar comes from Nelson Alfonso of ‘Selected Tobacco’. Nelson is a Cuban artist responsible for Atabey & Byron Cigars. The Bandolero Soberbios is a full-bodied robusto that is handmade in Costa Rica by Selected Tobacco. It is composed of an undisclosed proprietary blend, and it has a rich complexity of flavors that includes cedar, cocoa, and spice. Bandolero is the creation of Nelson Alfonso, a Cuban graphic designer who is recognized in the cigar industry for doing the artwork and packaging for the Cohiba Behike brand. Alfonso is also the founder of Selected Tobacco.
